autoSubmit.description: Go straight to next page once this page is complete

standard.description: The octave band levels standard name

F.description: Override the array of octave band frequencies to report, Hz

MPANL.description: Override the maximum permissible ambient noise levels (MPANL) for standard. Array length must match the number of octave band frequencies.

attenuation.description: Override the headset attenuation (in dB) at octave band frequencies. By default, tabsint will look at the `headset` property of the protocol or page to define the attenuation. Array length must match the number of octave band frequencies.

exportToCSV.description: Whether result should be exported to CSV upon submitting exam results.
